title: Porch - means a covered surface supported on pillars or otherwise, for the purpose of pedestrian or vehicular approach to an entrance in a building
clause_text: Porch - means a covered surface supported on pillars or otherwise, for the purpose of pedestrian or vehicular approach to an entrance in a building.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
